001package squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont;
005import squidpony.squidmath.LightRNG;
006
007/**
008 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 7/11/2015.
009 */
010public class DefaultResources {
011    private static BitmapFont narrow = null, square = null, unicode = null;
012    public final static String squareName = "Zodiac-Square-12x12.fnt",
013            narrowName = "Rogue-Zodiac-6x12.fnt",
014            unicodeName = "Mandrill-6x16.fnt",
015            squareNameLarge = "Zodiac-Square-24x24.fnt",
016            narrowNameLarge = "Rogue-Zodiac-12x24.fnt",
017            unicodeNameLarge = "Mandrill-12x32.fnt";
018    /**
019     * Returns a 12x12px, stretched but curvaceous font as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
020     * @return the BitmapFont object representing Zodiac-Square.ttf at size 16 pt.
021     */
022    public static BitmapFont getDefaultFont()
023    {
024        if(square == null)
025        {
026            try {
027                square = new BitmapFont(Gdx.files.classpath("Zodiac-Square-12x12.fnt"), Gdx.files.classpath("Zodiac-Square-12x12.png"), false);
028            } catch (Exception e) {
029            }
030        }
031        return square;
032    }
033    /**
034     * Returns a 12x12px, stretched but curvaceous font as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
035     * @return the BitmapFont object representing Zodiac-Square.ttf at size 16 pt.
036     */
037    public static BitmapFont getLargeFont()
038    {
039        if(square == null)
040        {
041            try {
042                square = new BitmapFont(Gdx.files.classpath("Zodiac-Square-24x24.fnt"), Gdx.files.classpath("Zodiac-Square-24x24.png"), false);
043            } catch (Exception e) {
044            }
045        }
046        return square;
047    }
048    /**
049     * Returns a 6x12px, narrow and curving font as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
050     * @return the BitmapFont object representing Rogue-Zodiac.ttf at size 16 pt.
051     */
052    public static BitmapFont getDefaultNarrowFont()
053    {
054        if(narrow == null)
055        {
056            try {
057                narrow = new BitmapFont(Gdx.files.classpath("Rogue-Zodiac-6x12.fnt"), Gdx.files.classpath("Rogue-Zodiac-6x12.png"), false);
058            } catch (Exception e) {
059            }
060        }
061        return narrow;
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Returns a 6x12px, narrow and curving font as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
066     * @return the BitmapFont object representing Rogue-Zodiac.ttf at size 16 pt.
067     */
068    public static BitmapFont getLargeNarrowFont()
069    {
070        if(narrow == null)
071        {
072            try {
073                narrow = new BitmapFont(Gdx.files.classpath("Rogue-Zodiac-12x24.fnt"), Gdx.files.classpath("Rogue-Zodiac-12x24.png"), false);
074            } catch (Exception e) {
075            }
076        }
077        return narrow;
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Returns a 6x12px, narrow and curving font with a lot of unicode chars as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
082     * @return the BitmapFont object representing Mandrill.ttf at size 16 pt.
083     */
084    public static BitmapFont getDefaultUnicodeFont()
085    {
086        if(unicode == null)
087        {
088            try {
089                unicode = new BitmapFont(Gdx.files.classpath("Mandrill-6x16.fnt"), Gdx.files.classpath("Mandrill-6x16.png"), false);
090            } catch (Exception e) {
091            }
092        }
093        return unicode;
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * Returns a 6x12px, narrow and curving font with a lot of unicode chars as an embedded resource. Caches it for later calls.
098     * @return the BitmapFont object representing Mandrill.ttf at size 32 pt.
099     */
100    public static BitmapFont getLargeUnicodeFont()
101    {
102        if(unicode == null)
103        {
104            try {
105                unicode = new BitmapFont(Gdx.files.classpath("Mandrill-12x32.fnt"), Gdx.files.classpath("Mandrill-12x32.png"), false);
106            } catch (Exception e) {
107            }
108        }
109        return unicode;
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * This is a static global LightRNG that's meant for usage in cases where the seed does not matter and any changes
114     * to this LightRNG's state will not change behavior elsewhere in the program; this means the GUI mainly.
115     */
116    public static LightRNG guiRandom = new LightRNG();
117
118    /**
119     * Special symbols that can be used as icons if you use the narrow default font.
120     */
121    public static final String narrowFontSymbols = "ሀሁሂሃሄህሆሇለሉሊላሌልሎሏሐሑሒሓሔሕሖሗመሙሚማሜ";
122
123}
